# CustomPresentationDetent.Context

**Type Alias**

Information that you can use to calculate the height of a custom detent.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Context = PresentationDetent.Context
```

## Getting the height

- **height(in:)**: Calculates and returns a height based on the context.

items.description: Calculates and returns a height based on the context.
items.name: height(in:)
